resources.string:
Cadpage Paging Service is now supported!!!
 See http://www.cadpage.org/paging-service

 General Fixes:
 Improved Lollipop compatibility
 Not recognizing lifetime subscriptions
 Call detail window closes when screen is touched outside of window
